# Title 1

### Subtitle 1

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(randomForest)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv("voctaxdata.csv")

df <- df %>%
  select(-id, -countryid, -countryname, -countrycode, -year)

head(df)
```

```{r}

model <- randomForest(gini ~ ., 
                      data = df,
                      na.action = na.omit,
                      mtry = 7,
                      importance = TRUE)

varImpPlot(model, main = "Importance", type = 2)
```
